author: Claire Landsbaum
title: The U.S. Office of Government Ethics Calls for Kellyanne Conway to Be Disciplined

organizations.name: u.s. office of government ethics calls

text: When Kellyanne Conway told Fox & Friends viewers to “ go buy Ivanka’s stuff ,” there was little doubt she’d violated federal ethics laws (“An employee shall not use his public office for his own private gain, for the endorsement of any product, service or enterprise, or for... More »
